comments.html: In my opinion your Ansible for Networking Engineers webinar is a little bit outdated regarding Ansible. When will you update it?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
Hello my Anonymous friend ;) You probably know I prefer facts over opinions, so it would be nice to get a list a few things you feel are missing. I'm aware of one or two (like XML parsing in 2.5), would love to see what you find most interesting.

I also have to wonder why you're hiding yourself behind an opinionated anonymous comment. People with access to the material usually send me a direct email with actionable feedback.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
